description: This PHP source file provides the web interface for managing firewall settings on a network device. It includes HTML and JavaScript for user interactions, and PHP for server-side configuration retrieval and inclusion of header/footer components.

methods.name: keyboard_toggle
methods.description: Handles the toggle of security level options when pressing Enter.

methods.name: setFirewall
methods.description: Sends an AJAX request to update the firewall configuration on the device.
